Text:
FYI  only "RELOADED" released and support's this game. if you say you got it from SKIDROW's SITE

Guess what that site has nothing to do with the CRACK GROUP

FAKE!


 if you update don,t use the steam_app_id.txt

 then your save game folder will not change

That "SkidRow" site has nothing to do with Skidrow.

And the only Dead Island releases have all been from Reloaded.

No other scene group has released anything for this game.
